Vulois

"I'm sorry, but there are six of us. And I'm not going inside the 
Alliance base. Not after the death of Soundwave, my close friend. 
I'll meet him right outside the base, with all six of us there. Even 
if he tries an attack, we can run. I'm sorry, but please return to 
The Keepers."
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

"Yeah, most of our lives," said Fliq, "We were born on Cybertron of 
course, but almost immediatly put on ship duty. Brix is alot older 
than me though. That's why he's the Captain. In fact, when we came to 
Past Earth, it was the first time we were on a planet in over a year. 
We've seen it all! So what about you? You mention sometimes that you 
died. Is this true?"
______________________________________________________________________
Savage

Savage watches as the ship caves in, and laughs. He lands on the 
ground and beats the side of the ship with his tail.
